attributes.action: Allow Tommy Robinson to receive PayPal payments again
attributes.additional_details: This is again clear evidence of the state and big companies trying to censor individuals with certain views, a clear breach of freedom of speech. No matter of political opinion or ideology, one should not be banned from using a public site. I have set up this petition to show PayPal the overwhelming public discontent with this decision, and for them to re open Tommy’s account!
attributes.background: Paypal has shut down Tommy Robinson’s PayPal account, therefore he is no longer able to receive donations.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. PayPal is a private company and the UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for their decisions.
